title.en: Drug Store Tenin Sacchan no Nichijou

altTitles.ja: ドラッグストア店員さっちゃんの日常

altTitles.vi: Chuyện nàng Sa ở tiệm thuốc

altTitles.en: Daily Life of Sa-chan, a Drugstore Clerk

altTitles.fr: Le quotidien de Sa-Chan, une vendeuse comme une autre
Le quotidien de Sa-chan, une employée de pharmacie

description.en: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.
description.fr: > Une série réunissant une employée de pharmacie sans expression, Sa-chan, et son ami d'enfance turbulent qui est fou amoureux d'elle mais qui hésite à lui avouer son amour. Accompagnez-les dans leur quotidien plein de comédie amoureuse en travaillant dans une pharmacie.
description.id: Seri antara petugas toko obat tanpa ekspresi, Sa-chan, dan teman masa kecilnya yang riuh yang jungkir balik terhadap Sa-chan tetapi ragu-ragu dalam mengakui cintanya padanya. Bergabunglah dengan mereka dalam kehidupan sehari-hari mereka yang penuh romansa bekerja di toko obat.
description.ja: ドラッグストアで働くさっちゃんとその幼なじみが両思いなんだけど、お互い気づかなくて毎日やきもきする話です。
description.pt-br: Uma série entre a inexpressiva balconista da drogaria, Sa-chan, e seu turbulento amigo de infância que está de ponta-cabeça por Sa-chan, mas hesita em confessar seu amor por ela. Junte-se a eles em sua vida cotidiana repleta de comédia romântica trabalhando em uma farmácia.

biography.en:
Rei Izumi (依澄れい, *Izumi Rei*) is a Japanese manga artist and illustrator. She was born on April 12th in Iwate Prefecture.

Support The Author:
[Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/author/34051/) | [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/stores/author/B004LTGOTM/) | [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/search/search.php?name=%E4%BE%9D%E6%BE%84%E3%82%8C%E3%81%84&text_type=author) | [ebook Japan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/lists/authors/56383/)

List of Works:
[Postal Work](https://mangadex.org/title/08b66959-ec96-4c05-803d-e1f927fc88a0) (2001-2004)
[Kanon & AIR Sky](https://mangadex.org/title/a2cf326b-f529-4bfb-a4b0-c2d6c733a7fb/kanon-air-sky) (2002)
[.hack//Legend of the Twilight](https://mangadex.org/title/d56676c2-61be-4ff3-a66e-eb138707369d/-hack-tasogare-no-udewa-densetsu) (2002-2003)
[Hibiki's Magic](https://mangadex.org/title/b02afc5d-8de3-4181-ba6e-4a926d515a85/hibiki-no-mahou) (Artist, story by Jun Maeda 2004-2016)
[School Youkai Traveler's Guide](https://mangadex.org/title/74dc13ca-e270-4339-a156-8842f9721894/gakkou-youkai-kikou-you) (Artist, story by Ryukishi07, Character design by Nishida E 2007)
[Men's Home Economics Club: Private Campanella Academy](https://mangadex.org/title/f3449462-8c0f-4876-974c-4a2d6050d375) (Monthly Shonen Ace 2017-2018)
[Kemono Friends a la Carte](https://mangadex.org/title/380d59c4-a98f-4de0-95fe-959b86baa506/kemono-friends-a-la-carte) (2017-2019)
[Fukinoshita-san Is Small](https://mangadex.org/title/4bddefeb-af60-4baa-9793-2b323a6d7c49/fukinoshita-san-wa-sega-chiisai) (Comic DAYS 2019-2020)
[Kohinata-san Wants to Confess](https://mangadex.org/title/f3b204e0-2d10-4fc6-b864-5dc7201893a0/kohinata-san-wants-to-confess) (2021-)

Rei Izumi (依澄れい, *Izumi Rei*) is a Japanese manga artist and illustrator. She was born on April 12th in Iwate Prefecture.
